data.name: HTNRG - Colored Skills 2020 (with bar coloring)
data.description:
/*
 * HTNRG - Colored Skills [Hattrick NewD]

 * Created     : Jan 7th, 2009
 * Version     : 5.0
 * Website     : url(http://nrgjack.altervista.org/)
 * Description : Modifies the spacing between boxes and the color of the skills in ht.
 * Usage       : Use with Stylish Firefox extension (http://userstyles.org/) 
 */ 


cambia il colore delle skill 

v5.0 bar
v4.0 added color for personality
v3.0 fix
v2.0 skill color by step
v1.0 skill color matrix



MORE STYLES HERE : 
http://www.nrgjack.altervista.org/wordpress/2010/04/13/stili-per-hattrick/

data.name: Kissanime Nova
data.description:
Simple visual upgrade. 

Changes:
   - Navbar
   - Links
   - Pictures on the main page
   - Removes ads with a kinda unstable technique, but it works (does not affect onclickads)
   - Animations for hovering over links and things
